body: @Himiko oops well I'm late to responding- but still. Maybe stop trying to justify hate commenting and admit ya screwed up? Whatever tho, I don't really care about this anymore.

I'm just expressing my opinion, I don't have to keep everything pent up inside I also don't hate everything there's a lot of danganronpa doujinshis I like neither have I said anything about the ship. There's bound to be hate comments on everything and I'm on of the instigators. The best thing you could do it just ignore it there's always a reason to hate something and I have my own

@Himiko Look I don't like the ship that much either, but can you stop shitting on every Danganronpa doujin in comment section? It's not bad- if you don't like it just don't read it. I find plenty of stuff on this website I don't like but I don't feel the need to bash the doujin.

@Himiko Yumeno
Yeah, I don't like this ship, but are you one of those shitty toxic people that won't let people ship what they want?
Excuse me? What the fuck, no. Also why does the art style look so ugly. my 5 year old self could draw something better with my pencil coming out my damn ass
